description: Spring roll wrappers with goat and cheddar cheeses. Crunchy, creamy & delicious. An easy-to-make vegetarian goat cheese recipe.Â
name: Every-day-is-Mother's-Day-Part 1: Goat Cheese Purses
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup + 2 tbsp crumbled aged goat's cheese

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, beat the egg. Add both cheeses.
Mix well together, add oregano and salt. Mix again until well combined. Set aside.
Using a pastry brush, coat each spring roll wrapper on both sides with extra virgin olive oil.

Place one wrapper in your hand, add about a teaspoon of filling in the center. Gather up the edges and give it a little twist to enclose the filling, so it looks like a purse. Place in a mini muffin tin.
Repeat the same procedure with the rest of the wrappers
Bake at 375F for seven minutes, until golden brown.
Enjoy! From May I have that recipe
